title: Q - dodge.
body:
Hello there fellow summoners.
I was in a good mood today so i thought i'd play a ranked game then do grown up's stuff, so i entered  game. 
After just 15 seconds of champ selection, two premade started flaming and insulting a player who banned Ekko, champion someone wanted to pick in our team (one of the premade kids) , insults led to a thing that led to another and i found myself in a team with 2 trolls and 2 guys flaming at them (while i was thinking "WTF"), so here comes my question, why the fuck in this world, do i have to pay -10 LP and 30 MINUTES PENALTY for dodging a game with stupid people ? Why the fuck should i be paying a punishment for not wanting to play with toxic players?  

Thank you to whom read me and have a nice day!

replies.body:
Because Riot. 
Jokes aside, unlucky day. Happens to everyone.
Grazie Darki. L'unico educato presso la comunita Ita fino ad'ora.
Np, after 4 months you might see some changes though (maybe)

This is italian forum. Go on English forum.
Jacobozz
Che i tuoi genitori magari mancarono al apello il giorni della tua educazione :*
